interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  2  to unlock this Event.
interactivity.to_get_this_event: This Event will occur automatically on or after Day 2. Autoplays after " First (?) Day of School " . This event is the final event in an event chain started from " Every Day I Grow Some More " .

progression.synopsis: After school has concluded for the day, Sensei arrives home and heads to the bathroom to take a shower, hoping for a relatively peaceful night. Meanwhile, Ami , Ayane , and Maya are having a sleepover in Ami's room, and discussing various topics, including Ayane's family fortune and love for Sensei - a topic Maya has absolutely no interest in contributing to. Later, as Maya asks to grab something to eat, Ayane leaves her and Ami to get Maya some food from the kitchen and use the restroom.
trivia: This is the first time in the game a character other than Maya or the omniscient narrator breaks the fourth wall.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.1.
